original_title: Operation ‘Yukthiya’: 667 more suspects arrested within 24 hours
original_body_lines: A total of 667 more suspects have been arrested by Sri Lanka’s police and security forces personnel within a 24-hour window ending at 12.30 a.m. today (Feb. 05) as part of the ongoing countrywide anti-drug operation ‘Yukthiya’.
According to the Ministry of Public Security, the narcotics taken into custody during this period include 191 grams of heroin and 103 grams of crystal methamphetamine (Ice).
